# The AlphaVantage API

In this chapter we will learn about APIs using the AlphaVantage API as a practical example.

The AlphaVantage API provides a weather of financial and economic data, including data about stocks and economic indicators such as inflation.


URL: `https://www.alphavantage.co/query?function=INFLATION&apikey=YOUR_KEY&datatype=csv`
